articles.headline: Packers activate Christian Watson (knee) from PUP list; WR set for return vs. Steelers
articles.content: The Packers have activated wide receiver Christian Watson (knee; questionable) from the physically unable to perform list, clearing the way for his season debut Sunday night against the Steelers. Watson is set for a return after recovering from the torn ACL he suffered in 2024's regular-season finale. The 26-year-old has served as Green Bay's play-making deep threat when healthy, averaging 16.9 yards per reception through his first three seasons.

articles.headline: Aaron Rodgers Set to Return from Injury
articles.content: Sources say the Jets are activating Aaron Rodgers this week after a speedy recovery from an Achilles injury.

articles.headline: Josh Allen’s MVP Case Growing Stronger
articles.content: After another dominant performance, Josh Allen continues to climb the MVP ladder with Buffalo holding one of the best records in the AFC.

articles.headline: Top Passing Leaders — Week 8
articles.content:
1. Patrick Mahomes — 2,384 yards
2. Joe Burrow — 2,190 yards
3. Lamar Jackson — 2,045 yards
